name: Relaxaurus Lux

ability.name: Missile Party
ability.description: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a missile launcher while mounted.

description: One day, Relaxaurus had an idea. Maybe it was about time for a change. Just then, an electric shock raced through its body!

skills.name: Spark Blast
skills.description: The user releases a lightning ball that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.

skills.name: Dragon Cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

skills.name: Lightning Streak
skills.description: Generates a lightning bolt that moves forward in a line.

skills.name: Draconic Breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: Lightning Strike
skills.description: Acts as a lightning rod, calling down thunderbolts that electrocute the surrounding area.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.
